text: Mary Pruitt (February 3, 1934 â€“ September 20, 2020) was an American politician. She was born in Brentwood, Tennessee. Pruitt was a member of the Democratic Party. Between 1985 to 2013, she was a member of the Tennessee House of Representatives. Pruitt died on September 20, 2020 at a Nashville, Tennessee hospital from a blood clot caused by a fall, aged 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Deaths from blood clot Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mary Pruitt
